text: The year 2015 is the 12th year in the history of the Konfrontacja Sztuk Walki, a mixed martial arts promotion based in Poland. In 2015 Konfrontacja Sztuk Walki held 4 events beginning with, KSW 30. ==List of events== {| class="sortable wikitable succession-box" style="margin:1.0em auto; font- size:90%;" |- ! scope="col" | # ! colspan="1" style="background-color: #E6E8FA; color: #000000; text-align: center;" | Round ! colspan="1" style="background-color: #E6E8FA; color: #000000; text-align: center;" | Time ! colspan="1" style="background-color: #E6E8FA; color: #000000; text-align: center;" | Notes |- |Heavyweight 120 kg | Peter Graham |def. | Mariusz Pudzianowski |TKO (Punches and Elbows) |align=center|2 |align=center|2:00 | |- |Welterweight 77 kg | Borys Mańkowski (c) |def. | Jesse Taylor |Submission (Guillotine Choke) |align=center|1 |align=center|3:02 |For the KSW Welterweight Championship. |- |Heavyweight 120 kg | James McSweeney |def. | Marcin Różalski |Submission (Rear Naked Choke) |align=center|1 |align=center|2:13 | |- |Light Heavyweight 93 kg | Tomasz Narkun |def. | Goran Reljic (c) |TKO (Punches) |align=center|1 |align=center|1:55 |For the KSW Light Heavyweight Championship. |- |Lightweight 70 kg | Mateusz Gamrot |def. | Marif Piraev |TKO (Punches) |align=center|2 |align=center|3:21 | |- |Welterweight 77 kg | Jim Wallhead |def. | Rafał Moks |KO (Punches) |align=center|2 |align=center|2:26 | |- |Heavyweight 120 kg | Oli Thompson |def. | Michał Włodarek |Disqualification (Illegal Knee) |align=center|3 |align=center|3:00 | |- |Middleweight 84 kg | Maiquel Falcao |def. | Brett Cooper |KO (Punch) |align=center|1 |align=center|0:59 | |- |Lightweight 70 kg | Leszek Krakowski |def. | Andre Winner |Decision (Unanimous) |align=center|3 |align=center|5:00 | |- |} ==KSW 33: Materla vs. Khalidov== KSW 33 was a mixed martial arts event held on November 28, 2015 at the Tauron Arena in Krakow, Poland. ===Background=== UFC veteran Tomasz Drwal was expected to face Aziz Karaoglu on his way to a KSW Middleweight Championship bout against winner of the main event of KSW 33, but Drwal pulled out due to a knee injury. He was replaced by Maiquel Falcao. Ariane Lipski also replaced Kamila Porczyk who pulled out from her match against Katarzyna Lubonska due to injury. Bonuses: * Fight of the Night: Artur Sowiński vs. Kleber Koike Erbst * Performance of the Night: Mamed Khalidov and Karol Bedorf ===Results=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 80%;" |- ! colspan="8" style="background-color: #ccf; color: #000080; text-align: center;" | Fight Card |- !
